If money is an immediate concern, see the chapter on Rights 
and	benefits	(page	187)	for	information	on	what	you	can	
claim and your employment rights. Your local Social Security 
or	Jobs	and	Benefits	Office	or	Citizens	Advice	will	be	able	to	
give you more advice.
If you have housing problems, contact your local Citizens 
Advice	or	your	local	Housing	Executive	Office.
Gingerbread	helpline	0808	802	0925	(9am–5pm,	Mon–Fri).
